SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class is the main class of the game. It is responsible for managing the game flow and the interactions between the model and the views.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()
      Constructor of the Controller class. It initializes the mainTable, the currentPlayerId, the playersAdded, the startingCardsAndObjAdded and the clientsConnected.

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Returns whether the current turn is the last one or not.
      Returns:
      : true if the current turn is the last one, false otherwise.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Method that resets the game. It brings the game to the original status, fresh out of the constructor.

      public void addModelObserver(Observer observer)
      Adds an observer to the mainTable.
      Parameters:

      public void removeModelObserver(Observer observer)
      Removes an observer from the mainTable.
      Parameters:
      observer - : the observer to be removed.

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(int num)
      Sets the number of players in the game both on the controller and on the mainTable.
      Parameters:
      num - : number of players.

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()
      Returns the number of players.
      Returns:
      : number of players in the game.

    • addClientConnected

      public void addClientConnected()
      Adds a client to the game. Increments the number of clients connected by one.

    • getClientsConnected

      public int getClientsConnected()
      Returns the number of clients connected to the game.
      Returns:
      : number of clients connected to the game.

    • setCurrentPlayerId

      public void setCurrentPlayerId(int currentPlayerId)
      Sets the id of the current player. Used when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerId - : id of the current player.

    • setClientsConnected

      public void setClientsConnected(int clientsConnected)
      Sets the number of clients connected to the game. Used when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      clientsConnected - : number of clients connected to the game.

      public void setPlayersAdded(int playersAdded)

      playersAdded - : number of players added to the game.

      public void setStartingCardsAndObjAdded(int startingCardsAndObjAdded)
      Sets the number of starting cards and objectives added to the game. Used when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      startingCardsAndObjAdded - : number of starting cards and objectives added to the game.

    • setLastTurn

      public void setLastTurn(boolean lastTurn)
      Sets whether the current turn is the last one or not. Used when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      lastTurn - : true if the current turn is the last one, false otherwise.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(int id, String nickname)
      Adds a player to the game. Checks whether the game is loaded or not and starts the game.
      Parameters:
      id - : id of the player.
      nickname - : nickname of the player.

    • getNumOfPlayersCurrentlyAdded

      public int getNumOfPlayersCurrentlyAdded()
      Returns the number of players currently added to the game.
      Returns:
      : number of players currently added to the game.

    • drawStartingCard

      public StartingCard drawStartingCard()
      Calls mainTable.drawStartingCard(), which draws the starting card from the deck.
      Returns:
      : the starting card drawn.

    • setStartingCardAndDrawObjectives

      public Objectives[] setStartingCardAndDrawObjectives(int playerId, StartingCard card)
      Sets the starting card of a player and draws two possible secret objectives.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : id of the player who needs to pick objectives.
      card - : starting card of the player that is set.
      Returns:
      : two possible secret objectives drawn, one will be picked by the player.

    • setSecretObjectiveAndUpdateView

      public void setSecretObjectiveAndUpdateView(int playerId, Objectives obj)
      Sets the secret objective of a player and updates the view.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : id of the player who has picked its objective.
      obj - : secret objective picked by the player.

    • startGameFromFile

      public void startGameFromFile()
      Starts the game from the file. Loads the game and initializes the view. Updates the deck and shows the turn to the correct player.

    • getPlayablePositions

      public boolean[][] getPlayablePositions(int playerId)
      Returns the empty positions where a card can be played on a given player board.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : id of the player who asked the playablePositions.
      Returns:
      : a matrix of booleans representing the empty positions where a card can be played.

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int onHandCard, int onTableCardX, int onTableCardY, int onTableCardCorner, int playerId, boolean isFront)
      Plays a card on the table. If the card is played successfully, the points are updated and the board updated.
      Parameters:
      onHandCard - : hand position of the card to be placed.
      onTableCardX - : row position of the board card over which the hand card is placed.
      onTableCardY - : column position of the board card over which the hand card is placed.
      onTableCardCorner - : corner position of the board card over which the hand card is placed.
      playerId - : id of the player who is playing the card.
      isFront - : true if the card is played on the front, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      : true if the card is played successfully, false otherwise.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int position, int playerId)
      Draws a card from either the deck or the board position.
      Parameters:
      position - : deck or board position.
      playerId - : player who's drawing the card.

    • endTurn

      private void endTurn()
      Handles the end of the turn: picks next player's turn, checks whether the game is ending or not and eventually computes the winner.

    • updateCurrentPlayer

      private void updateCurrentPlayer()
      Updates the current player. If the current player is the last one, the first player is picked. If the current player is not the last one, the next one up is the player with the next id. At the end of each turn, the game and deck statuses are saved onto the respective files.

    • computeWinner

      private void computeWinner()
      Computes the winner of the game. It calls the mainTable.computeWinnerAtEndGame() method.

    • getCardsOnHand

      public ResourceCard[][] getCardsOnHand()
      Returns the cards on hand of every player.
      Returns:
      : the cards on hand of every player.

    • getPlacedCards

      public PlaceableCard[][] getPlacedCards(int playerId)
      Returns the placed cards of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : id of the player who's placed cards are requested.
      Returns:
      : the placed cards of the player.

    • getResourceCounter

      public int[] getResourceCounter(int playerId)
      Returns the global objectives of the game.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : id of the player who's global objectives are requested.
      Returns:
      : the global objectives of the player.

    • getNicknames

      public String[] getNicknames()
      Returns the nicknames of the players in the game.
      Returns:
      : the nicknames of the players in the game.

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame()
      Loads the game from the respective files by calling the respective gameSaver functions. Once the decks, playerTables, mainTable and controller are loaded, the respective parameters are set onto the current controller and mainTable attributes. At the end of this, gameSaver's status is updated.

    • getSecretObjective

      public Objectives getSecretObjective(int playerId)
      Returns the secret objective of a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - : the specific player's id.
      Returns:
      : the player's secret objective.

    • isGameLoaded

      public boolean isGameLoaded()
      Checks whether a game is loaded from a file or not.
      Returns:
      : true is the game is loaded from a file, false otherwise.
